snippet: Ruch Limbaugh has a challenger with Mike Huckabee's new radio show.
abstract: Ruch Limbaugh has a challenger with Mike Huckabee's new radio show.
lead_paragraph: Brian Stelter reports on how Rush Limbaugh has some competition: Mike Huckabee will be doing a radio show from noon to 3 p.m. weekdays on Cumulus Media.
